title: Ben-Hur
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent to slavery by a Roman friend in 1st-century Jerusalem, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

title: Some Like It Hot
description: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

title: North by Northwest
description: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

title: Rio Bravo
description: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a cripple, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

title: Anatomy of a Murder
description: An upstate Michigan lawyer defends a soldier who claims he killed an innkeeper due to temporary insanity after the victim raped his wife.

title: The 400 Blows
description: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

title: Hiroshima Mon Amour
description: A French actress filming an anti-war film in Hiroshima has an affair with a married Japanese architect as they share their differing perspectives on war.

title: Black Orpheus
description: A retelling of the Orpheus and Eurydice myth, set during the time of the Carnaval in Rio de Janeiro.

title: The Diary of Anne Frank
description: During World War II, a teenage Jewish girl named Anne Frank and her family are forced into hiding in the Nazi-occupied Netherlands.

title: Sleeping Beauty
description: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.

title: Imitation of Life
description: An aspiring actress meets a black widow with a mixed-race daughter who passes for white. They form a household and the film follows their lives and the lives of their daughters.

title: Pillow Talk
description: A man and a woman who share a telephone line engage in a feud that turns into romance.

title: Pickpocket
description: Michel is released from jail after serving time for thievery. His mother dies, and he resorts to pickpocketing as a means of survival.

title: The World of Apu
description: This final installment in Satyajit Ray's Apu Trilogy follows Apu's life as an orphan and his eventual marriage and fatherhood.

title: Ballad of a Soldier
description: During World War II, a nineteen-year-old Russian soldier gets a few days' leave to visit his mother, but on his journey home, he helps various people he meets.

title: The Human Condition I: No Greater Love
description: A pacifist Japanese man tries to improve the conditions for prisoners of war in a Manchurian mine during WWII.

title: On the Beach
description: After a global nuclear war, the residents of Australia must come to terms with the fact that all life will be destroyed in a matter of months.

title: Suddenly, Last Summer
description: The only son of a wealthy widow dies while on vacation with his cousin. The cousin is institutionalized because she has gone insane from what she saw.

title: The Nun's Story
description: A young woman leaves her wealthy family to become a nun and eventually serves in a hospital in the Belgian Congo.

title: Shadows
description: The relationships of three African-American siblings in 1950s New York City.

title: Eyes Without a Face
description: A surgeon tries to rebuild his daughter's disfigured face by transplanting faces from young women he abducts.

title: Good Morning
description: Two boys beg their parents for a television set, but when they are refused, they take a vow of silence.

title: Floating Weeds
description: An aging actor returns to a small seaside town with his troupe and attempts to reconnect with his former lover and their son.

title: Fires on the Plain
description: A Japanese soldier in the Philippines during WWII struggles to survive amidst starvation, illness, and the horrors of war.

title: Nazarín
description: A humble priest attempts to live a pure Christian life but finds his good intentions often lead to disaster.

title: The Bridge
description: In the final days of WWII, a group of German schoolboys are drafted to defend a small bridge in their hometown against the advancing American army.

title: Destiny of a Man
description: A Soviet soldier experiences the horrors of World War II, loses his family, and finds hope in adopting a young orphan boy.

title: Letter Never Sent
description: Four geologists in the Siberian wilderness must fight for survival against a raging forest fire.

title: Look Back in Anger
description: A disaffected working-class man in a love triangle struggles with his life and relationships in a claustrophobic British apartment.

title: I'm All Right Jack
description: A naive upper-class man unwittingly causes a major strike when he takes a job at his uncle's missile factory.

title: Tiger Bay
description: A young girl witnesses a murder and is kidnapped by the killer, with whom she forms an unlikely bond.

title: The Mouse That Roared
description: The tiny nation of Grand Fenwick declares war on the United States, hoping to lose and receive foreign aid, but things don't go as planned.

title: Our Man in Havana
description: A vacuum cleaner salesman in Havana is recruited by British intelligence and begins inventing fake secrets to keep the job.

title: The Hound of the Baskervilles
description: Sherlock Holmes investigates the curse of the Baskervilles and a spectral hound haunting the moors.

title: The Mummy
description: Three British archaeologists discover the tomb of an Egyptian princess, unwittingly bringing a vengeful mummy back to life.

title: House on Haunted Hill
description: A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to stay overnight in a large, spooky, rented house.

title: The Tingler
description: A pathologist discovers a parasite that feeds on human fear and grows on the spinal cord, which can only be neutralized by screaming.

title: Day of the Outlaw
description: A band of outlaws takes over a small, snowbound Western town, leading to tension and violence.

title: Ride Lonesome
description: A bounty hunter tries to bring a murderer to justice while being pursued by the killer's brother and a pair of outlaws.

title: Last Train from Gun Hill
description: A marshal tries to bring the son of an old friend to justice for the rape and murder of his wife.

title: Warlock
description: A famous gunman is hired by a town to protect it from outlaws, but his methods soon cause conflict.

title: The Hanging Tree
description: A doctor saves a man from a lynch mob and a young woman from death, but his past secrets threaten his new life in a gold mining camp.

title: Odds Against Tomorrow
description: A corrupt cop recruits a racist ex-con and a black musician for a bank robbery, but their prejudices threaten to ruin the plan.

title: The Crimson Kimono
description: Two detectives, one Japanese-American and one Caucasian, investigate the murder of a stripper in Los Angeles' Little Tokyo.

title: Compulsion
description: Two wealthy law students murder a boy to prove they can commit the perfect crime, but their arrogance leads to their downfall.

title: The Young Philadelphians
description: A young lawyer navigates the social and ethical challenges of Philadelphia's upper crust to build his career and find love.

title: Operation Petticoat
description: During World War II, a submarine commander struggles to keep his damaged sub afloat with a crew of misfits and a group of Army nurses.

title: A Hole in the Head
description: A widower trying to run a Miami Beach hotel struggles to keep his business afloat and raise his son, while dealing with his eccentric family.

title: Porgy and Bess
oscars_won_details: Best Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: In Charleston, South Carolina, a disabled beggar named Porgy tries to rescue Bess from her abusive lover and a drug dealer.

title: Gidget
description: A teenage girl discovers surfing and romance during a summer in Malibu.

title: Darby O'Gill and the Little People
description: An old storyteller matches wits with the King of the Leprechauns and plays matchmaker for his daughter.

title: The Horse Soldiers
description: A Union Cavalry outfit is sent behind Confederate lines in strength to destroy a rail/supply depot.

title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
description: An Edinburgh professor and assorted colleagues follow an explorer's trail down an extinct Icelandic volcano to the earth's center.
